DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effects of Sarpogrelate in endothelial progenitor cells of patients with atherosclerosis.
DOC.brief_title: Impact of Sarpogrelate in the Function of Endothelial Progenitor Cells
DOC.detailed_description: Endothelial progenitor cells play an important role in vasculogenesis and vascular repair. Sarpogrelate, a inhibitor of HT2A, is used an an anti-platelet drug, however, a direct effect in vascular cells is supposed.
DOC.criteria: Patients with atherosclerosis Patients with high risk of bleeding Patients with pregnancy Patients with allergic reaction of Salpogrelate
